attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This sentence has recently been declared unlawful - as the prisoner is in limbo, and cannot be realeased until he/she has undertaken he nessacery rehabilitation programs - of which there are not enough. Someone has decided this is unfair on the prisoner!
Was the prisoners crime "fair" on the victim? Did the prisoner not know the possible repucussions when the crime was commited? 
Did the victim get access to support when needed after the crime?
This shouldn't be about what is fair on prisoners - but what is fair to the victims and society as a whole
We, the undersigned, petition the the government to appeal against this ruling - so that indeterminate sentences can remain.
